recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 500; Measure out 500 grams of cabbage, chopped| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of tomato sauce| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of water| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until beef is browned| Untimed; None; Drain excess fat| Untimed; None; Add cabbage, tomato sauce, water, salt, and black pepper to the skillet| Untimed; None; Stir to combine| Timed; 1200; Simmer for 20 minutes, or until cabbage is tender| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Ground Beef and Cabbage
